verses.verse: And the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, came <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

and they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my <S%H3068>lord<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and my <S%H113>lord<s%> was <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by <S%H113>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

And if they be <S%H802>married<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the other <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, then will their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be <S%H1639>taken<s%> away from the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and will be <S%H3254>added<s%> to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> whereunto they shall <S%H1639>belong<s%>: so will it be taken away from the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

And when the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5159>be<s%>, then will their inheritance be <S%H3254>added<s%> unto the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> whereunto they shall <S%H5159>belong<s%>: so will their inheritance be taken <S%H1639>away<s%> from the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> speaketh <S%H1696>right<s%>.

This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> doth <S%H6680>command<s%> concerning the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let them be <S%H802>married<s%> to whom they <S%H5869>think<s%> <S%H2896>best<s%>; only into the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> shall they be <S%H802>married<s%>.

So shall no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5437>remove<s%> from <S%H4294>tribe<s%> to <S%H4294>tribe<s%>; for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And every <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, that <S%H3423>possesseth<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in any <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall be <S%H802>wife<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%>, that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H3423>possess<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

So shall no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5437>remove<s%> from one <S%H4294>tribe<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%>; for the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his own <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

for <S%H4244>Mahlah<s%>, <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>, and <S%H2295>Hoglah<s%>, and <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, and <S%H5270>Noah<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%>, were <S%H802>married<s%> unto their <S%H1730>father<s%>'s <S%H1121>brothers<s%>' sons.

They were <S%H802>married<s%> into the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> remained in the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>.

These are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.
